availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry M. Skillman (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky, native. Married to Margaret Skillman. Father of Matthew Skillman, Thomas Skillman, and Henry M. Skillman. Physician in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 391.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 202B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Fayette County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 21.
Find A Grave, "Dr. Henry Martyn Skillman (1824-1902)," Memorial #50782694, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/50782694(accessed July 31, 2019).
